auth.failed: Butiran ini tidak sepadan dengan rekod kami.
auth.throttle: Terlalu banyak percubaan log masuk. Sila cuba lagi dalam :seconds saat.
passwords.password: Kata laluan mestilah sekurang-kurangnya enam aksara dan sepadan dengan pengesahan.
passwords.reset: Kata laluan anda telah ditetapkan semula!
passwords.sent: Kami telah e-mel pautan set semula kata laluan anda!
passwords.token: Token set semula kata laluan ini tidak sah.
passwords.user: Kami tidak dapat mencari pengguna dengan alamat e-mel tersebut.
validation.alpha_dash: :attribute boleh mengandungi huruf, nombor, dan sengkang.
validation.boolean: :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.email: :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.ip: :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.json: :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation.max.file: :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobait.
validation.max.string: :attribute may not be greater than :max aksara.
validation.max.array: :attribute may not have more than :max perkara.
validation.mimes: :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_without: :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
